argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | lspval.v | |- V = ( Base ` W ) |
| 2 |  | lspval.s | |- S = ( LSubSp ` W ) |
| 3 |  | lspval.n | |- N = ( LSpan ` W ) |
| 4 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_lspf | |- ( W e. LMod -> N : ~P V --> S ) |
| 5 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( Base ` W ) e. _V |
| 6 | 1, 5 | #P_eqeltri | |- V e. _V |
| 7 | 6 | #P_elpw2 | |- ( U e. ~P V <-> U C_ V ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_biimpri | |- ( U C_ V -> U e. ~P V ) |
| 9 |  | #P_ffvelrn | |- ( ( N : ~P V --> S /\ U e. ~P V ) -> ( N ` U ) e. S ) |
| 10 | 4, 8, 9 | #P_syl2an | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ U C_ V ) -> ( N ` U ) e. S ) |
